seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## Lightricks just made AI video generation 30x faster — and you won’t need a $10,000 GPU  

Lightricks has unveiled its LTXV-13B AI video model, which leverages "multiscale rendering" technology to achieve a 30x speed boost compared to competitors—all while running on consumer-grade hardware instead of expensive GPUs. This breakthrough could democratize high-performance AI video generation by eliminating the need for costly hardware.  

### Why It Matters  

This advancement marks a significant leap in accessibility for AI video generation, traditionally dominated by resource-heavy models requiring high-end GPUs. By optimizing performance for consumer hardware, Lightricks lowers the barrier to entry for creators, potentially accelerating adoption across industries like marketing, entertainment, and education. The efficiency gains could also spur innovation in real-time video applications, making AI-powered content creation more practical for everyday users.
